doc:
Nancy Balbirer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nancy_Balbirer 0 Nancy Balbirer (born October 8, 1965) is an American actress, playwright, performance-artist and author, best known for her solo show, I Slept With Jack Kerouac and Other Stories, and the memoir Take Your Shirt Off and Cry: A Memoir Of Near-Fame Experiences. Nancy_Balbirer ( born October_8_,_1965 ) is an_American_actress , playwright , performance-artist_and_author , best_known for her_solo_show , I Slept With Jack_Kerouac and Other_Stories , and the_memoir Take Your_Shirt_Off_and_Cry : A_Memoir Of Near-Fame_Experiences .
